about_the_game:
The soundtrack to the satirical retro first person shooter Randy Blaster 3D. A nostalgic and heavy soundtrack that nods to Doom and Meshuggah simultaneously.

Written and produced by dial-up for murder using only the microsoft wavetable synth that you know and love from the 90s.

I did cheat a little bit on the master fader with some light limiting, and a stereo image reverser so that the hi-hats are on the left and the ride & china are on the right like they should be.

Thanks to nanoshrine for additional advice on some arrangements.
